Survivor:18 castaways were cut off from

Gabon was the yellow tribe...Kota wins immunity and reward!

with the losses over and overagain.

>> PROBST: We are picking newtribes.
>> What?!>> No, no, no.

That may be the most surprisingdecision in ten days out here.

chosen and was sent on hersecond trip to Exile Island.
>> I already have the idol, soI chose comfort.
(chuckles)>> PROBST: At the immunity

>> PROBST: Randy scores forKota!

allies.14 are left.

Hello.>> Welcome back.
>> Yeah.So that means Jacquie's gone.
